column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The menu is pretty extensive
column2: but they make it pretty simple to pick what to order
column3: since all their house favorites are marked in red. We had the shrimp
column5: and short rib (all marked in red)
column6: and the chicken empanada. All really tasty
column8: etc. My favorite was probably the shrimp--it had garlic and hot peppers
column11: once youre done eating all the shrimp
column12: it makes for a great dipping sauce for the complimentary bread they give you!
